title: Capture Charges from an Encounter
description: A coding specialist is reviewing a physician's documentation to capture all billable charges from an office visit.

tasks.description: Review the provider's progress note for the patient encounter.
tasks.expected_outcome: Coder reads the clinical documentation to understand the services provided.

tasks.description: Select the appropriate Evaluation and Management (E&M) code based on the complexity of the visit.
tasks.expected_outcome: Coder correctly assigns the E&M level for the office visit.

tasks.description: Add charges for any additional procedures performed (e.g., an injection) and link the appropriate diagnosis codes to each charge.
tasks.expected_outcome: Coder accurately captures all billable services and ensures they are medically justified by a diagnosis.
